alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:58PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cache and northeastern Box Elder Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 557 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riverside, or near Tremonton, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tremonton, Plymouth, Howell, Riverside, Garland, Elwood, Fielding, Deweyville, Portage, Washakie, Collinston, Bothwell and Thatcher. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 376 and 400. Interstate 84 between mile markers 20 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
